properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu praanamu prabho nenu nee karpinthunu Naadu chethuleppudu needu seva chayanee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu kallu lessagaa needu throva nadvanee Naadu swara mennadu needu stuthi paadani{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu noru nityamu needu bodha palcanee Naadu sommu soththulu neeku niththu neppudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu kaalamanthayu ninnu brasthuthimpanee Buddipoorvakambugaa ninnu nenu kolvanee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sonthamelu goraka needu keerthi gorudu Naadu nantharangamu sweekarinchi yelumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu nindu premanu nee karpinthu neppudu Nannu needu soththugaa neevangeekarimpumu{/lang-eng}
